subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: As the Dodgers prepared to meet the Yankees in a two-game series, they were the hottest team in baseball, having won 26 of 32 games and holding a two-and-a-half-game edge in the N.L. West.
snippet: As the Dodgers prepared to meet the Yankees in a two-game series, they were the hottest team in baseball, having won 26 of 32 games and holding a two-and-a-half-game edge in the N.L. West.
